RULES:
1) Do not talk about this game outside of this thread, with the sole exception of Quicktopic if your PM allows it.
2) Do not quote PMs from the mod or text from your QT if you have one.
3) Do not use any invisible, tiny, or otherwise hidden text.
4) Do not delete or edit previous posts.
5) This is a game. Do not personally attack, threaten, or be excessively rude to other players. Likewise, if another player is insulting or criticizing you, take it maturely as long as it's in the spirit of the game.
6) Either bold your votes or use the vote tag (for example, VOTE: Phenenas). Unbolded votes will not count. You do not have to unvote before voting a different player, but it would be appreciated. You cannot, under any circumstances, vote yourself.
7) If the majority of the players vote for one player to be lynched, the day ends. You may also vote for nobody to be lynched during the day by posting VOTE: No Lynch
8) Days will, at the moment, last a maximum of 2 weeks, but can be shorter if a lynch or no lynch is voted before then. If the deadline is reached, nobody will be lynched, Night phase will commence, and any votes posted after the deadline will be ignored. I will consider extending the deadline upon request. Nights will last 48 hours. If you do not PM me your night action, if you have one, within that time period, it will not count. If you wish to take no action that night, it would be greatly appreciated if you informed me via PM.
9) If you die, you are allowed to make one "Bah" post that has no game-altering content in it, but after that, no talking until the game ends.
10) If you will be unable to be online for an extended period of time, please declare yourself V/LA in the thread, and state how long you expect to be unavailable. If a player does not declare V/LA and has not posted in 48 hours, they will be prodded via PM. They then have 24 hours to post in-thread or they will be replaced out. If a person has been prodded twice and fails again to post for 48 hours, instead of being prodded a third time they will be replaced out.
11) If you must leave the game, please contact me via PM or say so in bold in the thread.
12) All roles will be decided using random.org, with absolutely no personal interference on the mod's part.
13) Play to your win condition. Joking around a little is tolerated and encouraged, but in the end you must try to help your alignment win the game.
14) These rules are not set in stone. As the mod, I reserve the right to change them as I see fit.
15) I'm human. I'm not perfect, and will almost certainly make a mistake or two. If I make any mistakes or forget something on a PM I sent you or on an in-thread post, please gently correct me. To get my attention in-thread, please use the phrase @Phenenas or @Mod and post your message in bold.
16) Blue is my favorite color. Please don't use it.
17) If you break any of the above rules, it will be my decision whether you will be warned, replaced, or modkilled.

The following is the Vanilla Town role PM. At least one player in the game recieved this role:

Vanilla Townie

You are a normal townsperson, trying to make a living and survive this insanity.

  • You have no abilities at Night.
  • Although you do not have any special abilities, your voice and vote are powerful weapons in their own right. Use them to your best advantage.
  • At no time may you privately communicate with any other player.
  • You win when all Mafia-sided players are dead, whether you survive to the end or not.
  • Please confirm via PM stating your role and alignment.
  • Be sure to pay attention to the game thread, which you will find here.


If you have any questions, corrections, or requests that you want my eyes to see only, feel free to PM me at any time during the game.

Role PMs are going out.

All roles have been sent out. If you have not recieved a role, please let me know ASAP.

Please confirm (instructions on how to do so are located on your role card) by PM. Day 1 will begin when 11 out of 13 players have confirmed.

Day 1 has begun.

The deadline for Day 1 is April 19, 4 PM CST.

"What is this?" he thought, as he began slowly performing his morning routine. He gently stroked the underbelly of his now rock hard shaft, caressing the balls with his other hairy hand. Back and forth, back and forth, his hand went - and all seemed normal until, suddenly, baboon had a chilling realization. He realized he would not be able to shake his current state of agitation - that  the vague lack of fulfillment that pervaded his very existence would never be exsanguinated. "I must stroke harder!" he thought, his irritation and savagery ever increasing. "HARDER!" he bellowed. But baboon knew, from that very moment, that something was dreadfully wrong. Something had to be purged - to be cleansed - before his life would ever be the same... again.

Vanilla Townie

Even-Night Tracker

You are a privately working detective, stealthily following your suspects each night to see who they visit.

  • On even nights only, starting with Night 2, you may "track" one person. This will show you who this player targeted during the night, if anyone.
  • You may not track yourself.
  • At no time may you privately communicate with any other player.
  • You win when all Mafia-sided players are dead, whether you survive to the end or not.
  • Please confirm via PM stating your role and alignment.
  • Be sure to pay attention to the game thread, which you will find here.

Even-Night Jailkeeper

You are a paranoid enforcer of the law, kidnapping citizens at night and detaining them for the safety of the town.

  • On even nights only, starting with Night 2, you may "jail" one person. This prevents your target from being killed, but also prevents them from using their night action.
  • You may not jail yourself.
  • At no time may you privately communicate with any other player.
  • You win when all Mafia-sided players are dead, whether you survive to the end or not.
  • Please confirm via PM stating your role and alignment.
  • Be sure to pay attention to the game thread, which you will find here.

Mafia Goon

You are a cold-blooded killer, and you will not stop killing until the entire town is burned to the ground.

  • Your partner is Ford Prefect, whose role is Mafia Rolecop.
  • You may discuss the game at any time with Ford Prefect in the Quicktopic link provided here.
  • Each night, in the Quicktopic thread, you may discuss with your partner on who to kill and who to send to carry out the kill. The one carrying out the kill must PM me their decision before the deadline is over.
  • You win when all Town-sided players are dead or nothing can prevent that from happening, whether you survive to the end or not.
  • Please confirm via PM stating your role and alignment.
  • Be sure to pay attention to the game thread, which you will find here.

Mafia Role Cop

Your job is to sniff and kill out any potentially dangerous law enforcement that might interrupt your conquest of the town.

  • You may discuss the game at any time with Ford Prefect in the Quicktopic link provided here.

  • Also, your night ability is the ability to "check" one town player per night, revealing to you their exact role. I will post the results on the Quicktopic. You can carry out the kill and check a player on the same night.
  • You win when all Town-sided players are dead or nothing can prevent that from happening, whether you survive to the end or not.
